name: KitchenScale
0:
”Alexa ask Kitchen Scale how much does one cup of honey weigh”
”Alexa ask Kitchen Scale how much does two cups of peanut butter weigh”
”Alexa ask Kitchen Scale about bananas”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: kitchen scale
Developer Terms of Use
des: Cooking by weight is the most accurate and easy way to measure ingredients. Kitchen Scale tells you how much common ingredients weigh. You can find out how much a teaspoon, tablespoon, or cup of an ingredient weighs in grams or ounces.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
